welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wan Tau Tong, Hong Kong! Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant city known for its bustling markets, delicious street food, and stunning skyline. We invite you to explore and experience all the charm and excitement this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hong Kong International Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours at the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
